  • Constructor Details

    • Book

      public Book(String title, String authors, double price, String isbn, String genre, int year)
      Constructs a Book object with the given price, year, title, authors, genre, and ISBN.
      Parameters:
      price - the price of the book.
      year - the year the book was published.
      title - the title of the book.
      authors - the authors of the book.
      genre - the genre of the book.
      isbn - the ISBN of the book.

    • equals

      public boolean equals(Object x)
      Compares this Book object with another object for equality. Returns true if and only if the given object is a non-null instance of Book class and has the same price, year, title, authors, genre, and ISBN as this Book object.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      x - the object to compare to this Book object
      Returns:
      true if the given object is equal to this Book object, false otherwise

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the Book object in the format: "The title of the book is [title], written by the author(s) [authors]. This book belongs to the [genre] genre. This book has the following ISBN number: [isbn]. It was published since [year] and it costs $[price]."
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string representation of the Book object
